thread.section_title: Marbles: the Brain Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marbles: the Brain Store | www.marblesthebrainstore.com
thread.title: Angie Bloom
thread.title_full: Marbles: the Brain Store reviewed by Angie Bloom

author: Angie Bloom
title: Angie Bloom
text: My dog ate a very important small piece of my game- which we later found in the backyard - ew. I emailed customer service to see if I could buy a replacement piece. They promptly sent me a new piece free of charge. They could have easily ignored me in hopes I'd buy a new game. This company has amazing toys and customer service to match. BTW- if you don't have OTRIO yet, you NEED it! Tables turned when I started begging my kids to play with me! Sometimes my husband and I play and it is a real challenge!
